titles.title: Agricultural Intelligence Measures Act
Agricultural Intelligence Measures Act
AIM Act
AIM Act
AIM Act
To establish the Office of Intelligence in the Department of Agriculture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
